summary: An in-depth look at the Canadian rock band Rush, chronicling the band's musical evolution from their progressive rock sound of the '70s to their current heavy rock style.
cast: Geddy Lee|Alex Lifeson|Neil Peart|Trent Reznor|Mike Portnoy|Kirk Hammett|Tim Commerford|Sebastian Bach|Jack Black|Gene Simmons|Billy Corgan|Mary Weinrib|Melanija Zivojinovich|Ray Danniels|Bernie Finkelstein|Kim Mitchell|John Rutsey|Donna Halper|Cliff Burnstein|Vic Wilson|Betty Peart|Glen Peart|Uriah Heep|Mick Box|Howard Ungerleider|Terry Brown|Liam Birt|Danny Carey|Vinnie Paul|John Roberts|Zakk Wylde|Jimmy Chamberlin|Jason McGerr|Taylor Hawkins|Matt Stone|Christopher Schneberger|Kelly Paris|Peter Collins|Rupert Hine|Kevin Shirley|Freddie Gruber|Les Claypool|Nick Raskulinecz|Stephen Colbert
keywords: rush|progressive rock|toronto ontario|ontario|subject name in title
title: Rush: Beyond the Lighted Stage
